residency_requirement: three years of residence in Canada within four years
centralizing mode of life in Canada
application_details: Mrs. Mindich was absent from Canada multiple times, totaling 618 days present
decision_reasoning: Citizenship Judge applied the 'centralized mode of life' test but inadequately analyzed her attachment to Canada
cause_of_action: Dispute over whether Mrs. Mindich met the residency requirement for Canadian citizenship
procedure_followed: Federal Court reviewed the Citizenship Judge's decision, considering conflicting interpretations of residency requirements
result_of_case: Minister's appeal succeeded; Mrs. Mindich can reapply for citizenship
